comments:
Using 200405271200, I got this error when trying to open the file plugin.xml of
org.eclipse.jdt.ui from the HEAD branch on dev.eclipse.org.

It is 100% reproducible.

Its a bug in the IBM implementation of StringCoding which doesn't deal with 
null charsets.

At best you should have gotten an UnsupportedEncodingException.  Its undefined 
when you provde a null charset.
Is this bug reported against IBM implementation of StringCoding?

While it's a bug in the vm handling of null charsets, PDE should never pass in 
null.  

The type of editor input when opening a file directly from cvs is now of type 
RemoteFileEditorInput, which I'm sure it's pretty new.

Therefore, PDE was not setting the charset when the editor input is of that 
kind and hence the problem.

Fixed.
